text: Before 1963, the U.S. state of Maine used to have a 3rd congressional district. The last representative is republican Clifford McIntire. ==List of representatives== Member Party Years ↑ Cong ress Electoral history District location Mark Langdon Hill Democratic- Republican March 4, 1821 – March 3, 1823 Redistricted from and re-elected in 1821.
